DisjunctionIntroduction2Inclusion (python class)ÔÉÅ

See also

math concept | python declaration class | python sample

This section presents the DisjunctionIntroduction2Inclusion python class.

This class models the inclusion of the disjunction-introduction-2 inference-rule in the target theory-elaboration-sequence.

Punctilious users do not need to instanciate objects from this class. In effect, the TheoryElaborationSequence class exposes the disjunction_introduction_2 property, and instanciation is automatic when this property is accessed for the first time.

class core.DisjunctionIntroduction2Inclusion(t, echo=None, proof=None)ÔÉÅ
